package.name: conradev's jetsamctl
package.shortDescription: Bend Jetsam's memory limits to your will.

descriptionlist.description: This tweak allows you to control iOS's built-in memory limiter program.
Helpful for apps and daemons that force quit due to Jetsam.

Simple usage: (for most applications)
jetsamctl -l MEMORY_WANTED_IN_MB PROCESS_NAME

i.e. jetsamctl -l 1024 PojavLauncher

Take a look at the original creator's GitHub repository to learn more!
Originally created and abandoned by conradev.

changelog.change: Pulled 0.1-1 directly from the GitHub releases.
